column2: "Aber a Hezekia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe eduonu akron wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Abija
column3: Zekaria ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dza n'egya David yɛe no tse nyinara."

column2: "Ɔno na n'ahendzi mu afe a odzi kan no mu
column3: bosoom a odzi kan no mu no
column4: obuebuee EWURADZE fie mbobow no

column2: "Na ɔdze asɔfo na Levifo no bae
column3: na ɔboaboaa hɔn kehyiaa boka afamu bea tɛtɛr no do
column7: hom Levifo; afei hom nyɛ homho krɔnkrɔn
column9: hom egyanom Nyankopɔn fi no krɔnkrɔn
column10: na hom nyiyi efifidze no mfi bea krɔnkrɔn no do hɔ."

column2: "Na hɛn egyanom fomee
column3: na wɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyiwa do
column4: na wɔpoow no
column5: na wɔdaan hɔn enyi fii EWURADZE ne tsenabew no ho
column6: na wɔdaan hɔn ekyir maa no."

column2: "Eso wɔatotow nkrandaa no no mbobow no mu
column3: na woedundum nkandzea no
column4: na wɔannhyew eduhuam na wɔammbɔ ɔhyew afɔr so wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no do amma Israel Nyankopɔn no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE n'ebufuw baa Juda na Jerusalɛm do
column3: na oyii hɔn maa dɛ wɔntotow hɔn ndzi akɔnaaba
column4: wɔnyɛ ahobowdze
column6: dɛ mbrɛ homara hom dze hom enyiwa hu yi."

column2: "Na
column3: hwɛ
column4: hɛn egyanom atotɔr afona ano
column5: na hɛn mbabanyin na hɛn mbabaa na hɛn yernom no

column2: "Afei ɔwɔ m'akoma mu dɛ menye EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: bedzi ahyɛmu
column5: ma n'ebufuhyew no aadan efi hɛn do."

column2: "Me mba
column3: afei mma hom nnyɛ akwadwer: na EWURADZE asan mu eyi hom dɛ hom ngyina n'enyim nsom no
column4: na hom nyɛ n'asomfo

column2: "Nna Levifo no soɛree
column3: Amasai ne ba Mahat
column4: na Azaria ne ba Joel a wofi Kohatfo mba mu no: na Merari ne mba mu
column6: na Jehalelel ne ba Azaria: na Gersonfo mu

column2: "na Elizaffo mba mu
column3: Simri na Jeuel: na Asaf ne mba mu
column4: Zekaria na Matania:"

column2: "na Heman ne mba mu
column3: Jehuel na Simei: na Jedutun ne mba mu
column4: Semaia na Uziel."

column2: "Na wɔboaboaa hɔn nuanom ano
column3: na wɔsaan hɔnho krɔnkrɔn
column4: na wɔkɔree
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm a ɔnam EWURADZE n'asɛm do tse no
column6: dɛ wɔrebɛpepa EWURADZE ne fi no mu."

column2: "Na asɔfo no kɛhɛɛn EWURADZE ne fi no mu afamu dɛ wɔrekɛprapra mu
column3: na woyiyii efifidze no nyinara a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE n'asɔrdan no mu no dze baa EWURADZE ne fi no n'abangua no do. Na Levifo no sosoe fii hɔ
column4: dɛ wɔrokɔtow egu ɔwora Kidron mu."

column2: "Afei bosoom a odzi kan no mu da a odzi kan no na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ krɔnkrɔn no
column3: na bosoom no ne da a otsia awɔtwe no wɔbaa EWURADZE ne nkrandaa no ho; na wɔyɛɛ EWURADZE ne fi no krɔnkrɔn nda awɔtwe: na bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia duesia no na wowiei."

column2: "Nna wɔhɛɛn mu kɔr ɔhen Hezekia nkyɛn wɔ ahemfi no mu
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Yɛaprapra EWURADZE ne fie hɔ nyinara
column6: nye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara ho
column8: ɔnye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara ho."

column2: "Nkyii so ndzɛmba no nyinara a ɔhen Ahaz n'ahendzi no mu no ɔtowee gui wɔ aber a ɔtoo mbra no
column3: yeesiesie na yɛayɛ no krɔnkrɔn; na
column4: hwɛ ɔwowɔ EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia no enyim."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Hezekia soɛɛr ahanamakye
column3: na ɔboaboaa kurow no mu asafohemfo no ano
column4: na osii mu kɔr EWURADZE ne fie."

column2: "Na wɔdze anantwisaa esuon
column3: na nguannyin esuon
column4: na nguambaa esuon
column6: bae wɔ ahenman no na krɔnkrɔnbea no na Juda ho bɔn ho afɔr ntsi. Na ɔhyɛɛ Aaron ne mba asɔfo no dɛ wɔmfa mbɔ afɔr wɔ EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na wokunkum anantwisaa no
column3: na asɔfo no sɔɔw bɔgya no
column4: na wɔdze petsee afɔrmbukyia no do: na wokunkum nguannyin no
column5: na wɔdze bɔgya no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do: wokunkum nguambaa no so
column6: na wɔdze bɔgya no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na wɔdze bɔn ho afɔr mpɔnkyenyin piin ɔhen no na mboanofo no enyim; na wɔdze hɔn nsa guguu hɔn do:"
"na asɔfo no kunkum hɔn
column3: na wɔdze hɔn bɔgyaa no yɛɛ bɔn ho afɔr guu afɔrmbukyia no do
column4: dɛ wɔdze repata ama Israel nyinara: osiandɛ ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ ɔhyew afɔr na bɔn ho afɔr no wɔmbɔ mma Israel nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔdze Levifo no gyinagyinaa EWURADZE ne fi no mu
column3: wɔdzedze nkasaa
column4: nye mbɛntasanku
column6: dɛ mbrɛ David na ɔhen n'adzehunyi Gad
column7: na nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan mbrasɛm no tse: na mbrasɛm no fi EWURADZE hɔ ɔnam no nkɔnhyɛfo do."

column2: "Nna Levifo no dzedze David n'adwontow ndzɛmba no gyinagyinae
column3: na asɔfo no so dzedze mbɛn."

column2: "Na Hezekia hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmbɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do. Na aber a ɔhyew afɔr no hyɛɛ ase no
column3: nna EWURADZE no ndwom no
column4: na ntotorobɛnto ɔnye Israelhen David n'asanku ndzɛmba no so hyɛɛ ase."

column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara kotokotowee na adwontofo no toow ndwom
column3: na mbɛnhɛmfo no hɛnee; iyi nyinara do araa dze kodur dɛ wowiee ɔhyew afɔr no bɔ."

column2: "Na aber a wowiee afɔr no bɔ no
column3: nna ɔhen no na hɔn a wohun hɔn wɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinara
column4: bobɔɔ hɔn mu adze sɔree."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔhen Hezekia na asafohemfo no hyɛɛ Levifo no dɛ wɔmfa David
column3: na adzehunyi Asaf nsɛm no nyi EWURADZE ayɛw. Na wɔdze enyigye yii ayɛw
column4: na wɔbobɔɔ hɔn tsir adze sɔree."

column2: "Nna Hezekia buae see dɛ
column3: Afei hom etu homho esi nkyɛn ama EWURADZE
column4: hom ntwe mpin
column5: na hom mfa okum afɔr na aseda afɔr mbra EWURADZE fie. Na mboanofo no dze okum afɔr na aseda afɔr bae; na dodow a wɔwɔ ayamuyi akoma no dze ɔhyew afɔr bae."

column2: "Na ɔhyew afɔr a mboanofo no dze bae no n'ano si anantwisaa eduosuon
column3: nguannyin ɔha
column4: na nguambaa ahaenu: iyinom nyinara wɔdze bɔbɔɔ EWURADZE ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Na etuhoakyɛ ndzɛmba no yɛ anantwi ahaesia na nguan mpemebiasa."
"Na asɔfo no dze hɔn ho suar dodow
column3: ma dɛm ntsi woenntum enngua ɔhyew afɔr no nyinara: dɛm ntsi hɔn nuanom Levifo no boaa hɔn araa kodur dɛ wowiee edwuma no
column4: na eso okodur dɛ asɔfo no yɛɛ hɔn ho krɔnkrɔn: osiandɛ Levifo no wɔtsen wɔ akoma mu dodow na wɔyɛɛ hɔnho krɔnkrɔn seen asɔfo no."

column2: "Na eso ɔhyew afɔr no dɔɔ so piigyan
column3: nye asomdwee afɔr ho seradze no
column4: na ɔnye ɔnom afɔr a ɔka ɔhyew afɔr biara ho no no. Nna wɔhyehyɛɛ EWURADZE fie ɔsom no pɛpɛɛpɛr."

column2: "Na Hezekia na ɔman no nyinara
column3: hɔn enyi gyee
column4: osian dza Nyankopɔn esiesie ama ɔman no ntsi: osiandɛ adze no wɔyɛɛ no ntsɛmdo."
